title: Oothikinnu Kadichikkava Lyrics Ninaivirukkum Varai
stanzas:
kaathadikkudhu
kaathadikkudhu
kaasi mettu kaathadikkudhu
enga desai paathadikkudhu
aezha jenam koothadikkudhu

ye velicham paaru
velicham paaru
pagala pola
velicham paaru
dullaana roatu mela
daal adikkum voodu paaru (2)

voottu mela bulba paaru
bulbu kaattum color-a paru
kannu koosum kaatchi paaru
kaasu seyyum vela paaru
kattu kattaa nottadicha
currentu billu katturaaru

nenachupaaru nenachupaaru
nenja thottu nenachupaaru
panjarkottu nikkar paaru
paathiyaana odambu paaru

kaanji pona thalaya paaru
saanji pona nadaya paaru
kuli vilundha kannam paaru
surungi pona vaitha paaru

kaathadikkudhu
kaathadikkudhu
kaasi mettu kaathadikkudhu
enga desai paathadikkudhu
aezha jenam koothadikkudhu

seo.title: Oothikinnu Kadichikkava Lyrics Ninaivirukkum Varai
seo.description: Get the complete Oothikinnu Kadichikkava Lyrics Ninaivirukkum Varai from Ninaivirukkum Varai. Read the lyrics penned by Palani Bharathi and composed by Deva and sung by Deva. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Palani Bharathi, Ninaivirukkum Varai, Deva, Deva, Krishnaraj, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
